summary: I bought a six-speed Brompton C-Line several weeks ago, replacing a Zizzo Forté.  I like having a non-electric "get around" bike, and I like having a folding bike for camping trips or flexible city travel.  The Zizzo was fine, but a little creaky for my tastes, with an ungainly fold
title: Several weeks on a 6-speed Brompton C-Line

summary:
Recently, I began reading Meditations for Mortals by Oliver Burkeman.  I've been trying to distance myself from self-help/psychology/philosophy books, but I saw someone on reddit make an interesting post regarding some content in the book, so I decided to give it a read. 

The book is designed so that you read one micro chapter a day for four weeks...
title: You Have a Choice
